chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, I have read the box model of CSS.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: You saw that if the width of any element is less

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and the content inside it is more,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then the items inside it overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: We can manage this overflow by using the CSS overflow property.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: We can bring a scroll bar inside CSS horizontally and vertically.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: We will learn these things in this video.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And we will also use it practically in the coming projects.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I want you to keep high energy.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Do write Sigma Batch OP in the comment section below.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So guys, I have come to my computer screen.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: As you can see, the first thing I am going to do here is

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: to make a new folder and I am going to name it video 26.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And today's video is on our overflow property.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: What is this overflow property?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Look, you have a box.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: You put such an item inside that box.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Because it is bigger than that box.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: What will it do? It will overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: It is obvious.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now how do you want the overflow to be handled in this way?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: It's up to you.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: For example, I have this box.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: It says, I am a good boy and I love to write lorem 45.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, let's say I wrote this.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Obviously, you will write something good.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Your meaningful content will be in the box.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And by correcting it here and by putting a style tag,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will write CSS in the dot box here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And I will tell you what that CSS will be.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: First of all, I will give it a width.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Let's say I give it a width of 40bw.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, it got 40% width of their viewport width.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And I will give it a height of 40bh.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: It got 40% of the viewport height.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, now after this I will give a border in it.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And that will be 2px solid black.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And the rest of you can see its preview here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: How is it looking?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, obviously I will show you in the browser.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Hey, this is not overflowed.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So what will I do to make it overflow?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will make it 10bh 10bw.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will make it 10.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now I made it 10bh 10bh.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So obviously it will overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Or if I make it 30bh 10bh,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then see it is overflowing below.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now because it is overflowing,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: what will I do to fix it?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So how can it be fixed?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: See it can be fixed in two ways.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: The first way to fix it is

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that I use overflow property here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Let's say overflow in this way.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And let's say scroll here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, so if I make it overflow scroll,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then a horizontal scroll bar will come out here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And the things that were overflowing from this box

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: will not overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And obviously it will come here too.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And you can see here that your work is done.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So to put such a scroll bar,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: you can use overflow scroll.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now there are many other properties related to overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Like, let's say if you have

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: made overflow auto here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I can make it overflow auto here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And by making overflow auto,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: if it overflows,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then you will see this scroll bar.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And if it doesn't overflow,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then you won't see the scroll bar.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: For example, if its viewport width is this much

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and its viewport height is this much,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then there is no chance of overflow here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So by making overflow auto,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: overflow auto says that

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: if it overflows,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then show the scroll bar.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And if it is not overflowing,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then you don't need to show the scroll bar.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Let the element remain normal.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: This is our overflow auto.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And if I say overflow scroll here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then even if everything is fine here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then what will happen here?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: You will get this scroll bar here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: You will get to see this kind of scroll bar.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: That's why it's always a good idea to put a scroll bar.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, so I hope you understood this thing

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that why to put a scroll bar here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now, if I had no wrapped its white space here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: let us say,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that is, if I come to my code

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and write it here for you,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will make the white space no wrap.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, so what will happen by no wrapping?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: That by no wrapping the white space,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: it will take the whole space horizontally

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and the text will not fall vertically below.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And if I do this

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and I will do a little less here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: let's say I make it 40.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: If I do 40, it will be this big.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And you can see the scroll bar here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: That is, when I do no wrap the white space,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: it means that don't drop the text below.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now you see here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: if I put ellipsis in overflow,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will show you by putting it here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Ellipsis.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Then you see here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I have put ellipsis in overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So after doing this,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I can set one more property,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: which is called text overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And there is a value called ellipsis in it,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: due to which these dots come.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: As you can see here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So this happens by doing white space,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: no wrap and text overflow ellipsis.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I hope you understood this thing.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Okay, so I will remove it once.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will do the format document

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and you understood.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now one thing to note here is that

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: this is not overflow,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: it is text overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So you have to take care of this thing.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Overflow is different.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Text overflow property is different.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Here I have auto overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So that's why I am getting three dots here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: If I would have hidden the overflow,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: okay,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then I would have seen three dots.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And if I would have scrolled the overflow,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then I would have seen three dots here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: You can see.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Because I have told text overflow

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that brother,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: do ellipsis here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And if I remove this ellipsis from here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then you can see that

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: this scroll bar has come here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I hope this thing is clear to you.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: How can you use this text overflow property?

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: After this, there is one more value,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: overflow clip,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: which you can use.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: This is a lot of hidden stuff.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Overflow clip and overflow hidden

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: are almost the same.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: The only difference is that

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: the clip is programmatically scrolling,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: which is also disabled.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: If you put the overflow clip,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then you can't scroll programmatically.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now the overflow can be handled individually.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Like what I will do here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will increase the text a little.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And in fact, I will do one thing here,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that I will remove the white space

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that I did here.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Because I want my content

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: to look something like this.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: And you can see

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that I have just auto overflow.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: That is, my content is not overflowing.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: To make the overflow,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will make the height a little smaller.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will also make the width a little smaller.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: I will make both 30 and 30.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: If I do 30 and 30,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then this overflow will be done.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: Now I can also control

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: overflow x and overflow y separately.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So I can say that

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: overflow x should be hidden.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: But if overflow is done in y,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then scroll it.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So I can also put these properties individually.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: If I put these properties individually,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then you can see overflow x, overflow y,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: by doing this, I am hiding overflow x

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and scrolling overflow y.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: If I also hide overflow y,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then whatever was below it will be hidden.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: If I hide overflow y,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then overflow x and overflow y

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: can be written with the help of overflow shorthand.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: If I write all three

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: in this way,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that the overflow is hidden in x

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and auto in y.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So you can see here

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that it is auto in y

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and hidden in x.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: But if I do it the other way around,

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: then I can also do it in this way.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So I can say that

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: overflow x is hidden in x

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: and overflow y is hidden in y.

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: So you can see here

chunks.title: CSS Overflow Property  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #26.mp4
chunks.text: that it is hidden in y.

text: Guys, I have read the box model of CSS. You saw that if the width of any element is less and the content inside it is more, then the items inside it overflow. We can manage this overflow by using the CSS overflow property. We can bring a scroll bar inside CSS horizontally and vertically. We will learn these things in this video. And we will also use it practically in the coming projects. I want you to keep high energy. Do write Sigma Batch OP in the comment section below. Let's go to the computer screen. Let's roll the intro. So guys, I have come to my computer screen. As you can see, the first thing I am going to do here is to make a new folder and I am going to name it video 26. And today's video is on our overflow property. What is this overflow property? Look, you have a box. You put such an item inside that box. Because it is bigger than that box. What will it do? It will overflow. It is obvious. Now how do you want the overflow to be handled in this way? It's up to you. For example, I have this box. It says, I am a good boy and I love to write lorem 45. Okay, let's say I wrote this. Obviously, you will write something good. Your meaningful content will be in the box. And by correcting it here and by putting a style tag, I will write CSS in the dot box here. And I will tell you what that CSS will be. First of all, I will give it a width. Let's say I give it a width of 40bw. Okay, it got 40% width of their viewport width. And I will give it a height of 40bh. It got 40% of the viewport height. Okay, now after this I will give a border in it. And that will be 2px solid black. And the rest of you can see its preview here. How is it looking? Okay, obviously I will show you in the browser. Hey, this is not overflowed. So what will I do to make it overflow? I will make it 10bh 10bw. I will make it 10. Now I made it 10bh 10bh. So obviously it will overflow. Or if I make it 30bh 10bh, then see it is overflowing below. Now because it is overflowing, what will I do to fix it? So how can it be fixed? See it can be fixed in two ways. The first way to fix it is that I use overflow property here. Let's say overflow in this way. And let's say scroll here. Okay, so if I make it overflow scroll, then a horizontal scroll bar will come out here. And the things that were overflowing from this box will not overflow. And obviously it will come here too. And you can see here that your work is done. So to put such a scroll bar, you can use overflow scroll. Now there are many other properties related to overflow. Like, let's say if you have made overflow auto here, I can make it overflow auto here. And by making overflow auto, if it overflows, then you will see this scroll bar. And if it doesn't overflow, then you won't see the scroll bar. For example, if its viewport width is this much and its viewport height is this much, then there is no chance of overflow here. So by making overflow auto, overflow auto says that if it overflows, then show the scroll bar. And if it is not overflowing, then you don't need to show the scroll bar. Let the element remain normal. This is our overflow auto. And if I say overflow scroll here, then even if everything is fine here, then what will happen here? You will get this scroll bar here. You will get to see this kind of scroll bar. That's why it's always a good idea to put a scroll bar. Okay, so I hope you understood this thing that why to put a scroll bar here. Now, if I had no wrapped its white space here, let us say, that is, if I come to my code and write it here for you, I will make the white space no wrap. Okay, so what will happen by no wrapping? That by no wrapping the white space, it will take the whole space horizontally and the text will not fall vertically below. And if I do this and I will do a little less here, let's say I make it 40. If I do 40, it will be this big. And you can see the scroll bar here. That is, when I do no wrap the white space, it means that don't drop the text below. Now you see here, if I put ellipsis in overflow, I will show you by putting it here. Ellipsis. Then you see here, I have put ellipsis in overflow. So after doing this, I can set one more property, which is called text overflow. And there is a value called ellipsis in it, due to which these dots come. As you can see here. So this happens by doing white space, no wrap and text overflow ellipsis. Okay. I hope you understood this thing. Okay, so I will remove it once. I will do the format document and you understood. Now one thing to note here is that this is not overflow, it is text overflow. So you have to take care of this thing. Overflow is different. Text overflow property is different. Here I have auto overflow. So that's why I am getting three dots here. If I would have hidden the overflow, okay, then I would have seen three dots. And if I would have scrolled the overflow, then I would have seen three dots here. You can see. Because I have told text overflow that brother, do ellipsis here. And if I remove this ellipsis from here, then you can see that this scroll bar has come here. I hope this thing is clear to you. How can you use this text overflow property? After this, there is one more value, overflow clip, which you can use. This is a lot of hidden stuff. Overflow clip and overflow hidden are almost the same. The only difference is that the clip is programmatically scrolling, which is also disabled. If you put the overflow clip, then you can't scroll programmatically. Now the overflow can be handled individually. Like what I will do here, I will increase the text a little. And in fact, I will do one thing here, that I will remove the white space that I did here. Because I want my content to look something like this. And you can see that I have just auto overflow. That is, my content is not overflowing. To make the overflow, I will make the height a little smaller. I will also make the width a little smaller. I will make both 30 and 30. If I do 30 and 30, then this overflow will be done. Now I can also control overflow x and overflow y separately. So I can say that overflow x should be hidden. But if overflow is done in y, then scroll it. So I can also put these properties individually. If I put these properties individually, then you can see overflow x, overflow y, by doing this, I am hiding overflow x and scrolling overflow y. If I also hide overflow y, then whatever was below it will be hidden. If I hide overflow y, then overflow x and overflow y can be written with the help of overflow shorthand. If I write all three in this way, that the overflow is hidden in x and auto in y. So you can see here that it is auto in y and hidden in x. But if I do it the other way around, then I can also do it in this way. So I can say that overflow x is hidden in x and overflow y is hidden in y. So you can see here that it is hidden in y. So here it is auto in x and hidden in y. So the first one is x and the second one is y. Now many people will ask how can I remember which is x and which is y. So you will do it. There is no need to remember anything like this. If you scroll it here you can see the scroll bar. And if you scroll here you will see the scroll bar here. I will recommend you to use auto as much as possible. Because what happens by doing auto? If there is a need for a scroll bar, then it puts a scroll bar. Otherwise it does not put a scroll bar.
